### Question 3
Rewrite the following model as a multilevel model.<br>
<div style="text-align: center;">
  <img src="q3.png" width="200" height="150">
</div>

```{text}
y_i ~ Binomial(1,p_i)
logit(p_i) = a[i] + b*x_i
a[i] ~ Normal(a_bar, sigma_a)
b ~ Normal(0,0.5)
a_bar ~ Normal(0, 1.5)    # extra parameters, hyper-priors, to construct a multi-level model
sigma_a ~ Exponential(1)
```
